# looker_role_groups (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "looker_role_groups" "role_groups" {
  role_id   = looker_role.role.id
  group_ids = [looker_group.group.id]
}
```

- `group_ids` (Set of String)
- `role_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
